definition.name: Publish to npm
definition.description: Automatically publish new versions to npm
definition.author: pascalgn

inputs.name: commit_pattern
inputs.description: The pattern that matches version update commits.

inputs.name: tag_name
inputs.description: The name of the tag that you want to create for the version.

inputs.name: tag_message
inputs.description: The message of the tag that you want to create for the version.

inputs.name: create_tag
inputs.description: Whether to create a git tag or not.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: Custom workspace directory that contains the package.json file.

outputs.name: changed
outputs.description: Whether the version has changed in the examined commits

outputs.name: commit
outputs.description: The SHA of the commit where the version change has been detected
